tool_description: This higly maintained API provides a list of universities and colleges in the world and their respective rankings in various regions
name: University/College List and Rankings
title: University/College List and Rankings

api_list.name: NORTH AMERICA UNIVERSITY RANKING
api_list.description: This endpoint provides the ranking for universities and colleges in North America
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://university-college-list-and-rankings.p.rapidapi.com/api/top-universities/northamerica"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "university-college-list-and-rankings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://university-college-list-and-rankings.p.rapidapi.com/api/top-universities/northamerica"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "university-college-list-and-rankings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET COUNTRIES USING CONTINENT NAME
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves countries by continent name. 
Supply of the continent name should be retrieved from the continent api

api_list.name: GET UNIVERSITIES AND RANKING BY COUNTRY
api_list.description:

Retrieve countryCode using "GET COUNTRIES USING CONTINENT NAME" API
